content.p: Except as otherwise provided in section12-217tand subsection
of this section, whenever a company is eligible to claim more than one corporation business tax credit, the credits shall be claimed for the income year in the following order:

Any credit that may be carried backward to a preceding income year or years shall first be claimed (A) with any credit carry-back that will expire first being claimed before any credit carry-back that will expire later or will not expire at all, and (B) if the credit carry-backs will expire at the same time, in the order in which the company may receive the maximum benefit;
with any credit carry-back that will expire first being claimed before any credit carry-back that will expire later or will not expire at all, and
if the credit carry-backs will expire at the same time, in the order in which the company may receive the maximum benefit;

any credit that may not be carried backward to a preceding income year or years and that may not be carried forward to a succeeding income year or years shall next be claimed, in the order in which the company may receive the maximum benefit; and

any credit that may be carried forward to a succeeding income year or years shall next be claimed (A) with any credit carry-forward that will expire first being claimed before any credit carry-forward that will expire later or will not expire at all, and (B) if the credit carry-forwards will expire at the same time, in the order in which the company may receive the maximum benefit.

subsection.heading: In no event shall any credit be claimed more than once

content.p: The rebate allowed pursuant to section32-7tshall be claimed after all other credits have been claimed. (Return to ChapterTable of Contents)(Return toList of Chapters)(Return toList of Titles)
